issue.title: [CF 1256] Missing "On Condition Set Passing" Option for Animation Notifications
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Add an Animation Notification to an icon.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

I expected to see the option for  "On Condition Set Passing" which allows me to set the duration of the Animation for the icon.  Instead I see nothing.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

I am using 8.1.2r3.  Not sure if this is feature got removed or if it is some kind of bug happening only with me.

Do you have an error log of what happened?

No error log.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

N/A


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash | Imported from CurseForge issue #1256 | Raw

comments.body:
This was just a case of user error. >_<


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash
